articles.description: Graham, a vocal defender of women's rights, has lost everything he holds dear in life because he dared to challenge a 'subculture' of trans activists over the 'insane' (his word) belief a person with a penis can be a woman.
articles.content:
Multi-BAFTA-winning writer Graham Linehan can barely hold himself together. He tells me he hardly slept last night.
There are times he has 'howled in pain' and times he has 'raged'.
Mostly, though,… [+13552 chars]
